MainLoop
========

**ç»§æ‰¿ï¼š** :ref:`Object<class_Object>`

**æ´¾ç”Ÿï¼š** :ref:`SceneTree<class_SceneTree>`

.. rst-class:: classref-introduction-group

æè¿°
----

**MainLoop** æ˜¯ Godot é¡¹ç›®ä¸­æ¸¸æˆå¾ªç¯çš„æŠ½è±¡åŸºç±»ã€‚å®ƒè¢« :ref:`SceneTree<class_SceneTree>` ç»§æ‰¿ï¼Œ\ :ref:`SceneTree<class_SceneTree>` æ˜¯ Godot é¡¹ç›®ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨çš„é»˜è®¤æ¸¸æˆå¾ªç¯çš„å®ç°ï¼Œä¸è¿‡ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ç¼–å†™å’Œä½¿ç”¨è‡ªå·±çš„ **MainLoop** å­ç±»ï¼Œæ¥ä»£æ›¿åœºæ™¯æ ‘ã€‚

åœ¨åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºå¯åŠ¨æ—¶ï¼Œå¿…é¡»å‘æ“ä½œç³»ç»Ÿæä¾›ä¸€ä¸ª **MainLoop** å®ç°ï¼›å¦åˆ™ï¼Œåº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºå°†é€€å‡ºã€‚è¿™ä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å‘ç”Ÿï¼ˆå¹¶åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª :ref:`SceneTree<class_SceneTree>`\ ï¼‰ï¼Œé™¤éä»å‘½ä»¤è¡Œæä¾›ä¸€ä¸ª **MainLoop** :ref:`Script<class_Script>`\ ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ ``godot -s my_loop.gd``\ ï¼‰ï¼Œæˆ–â€œä¸»å¾ªç¯ç±»å‹ï¼ˆMain Loop Typeï¼‰â€é¡¹ç›®è®¾ç½®è¢«è¦†ç›–ã€‚

æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå®ç°ç®€å• **MainLoop** çš„ç¤ºä¾‹è„šæœ¬ï¼š


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    class_name CustomMainLoop
    extends MainLoop
    
    var time_elapsed = 0
    
    func _initialize():
        print("Initialized:")
        print("  Starting time: %s" % str(time_elapsed))
    
    func _process(delta):
        time_elapsed += delta
        # è¿”å› true ç»“æŸä¸»å¾ªç¯ã€‚
        return Input.get_mouse_button_mask() != 0 || Input.is_key_pressed(KEY_ESCAPE)
    
    func _finalize():
        print("Finalized:")
        print("  End time: %s" % str(time_elapsed))

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    using Godot;
    
    [GlobalClass]
    public partial class CustomMainLoop : MainLoop
    {
        private double _timeElapsed = 0;
    
        public override void _Initialize()
        {
            GD.Print("Initialized:");
            GD.Print($"  Starting Time: {_timeElapsed}");
        }
    
        public override bool _Process(double delta)
        {
            _timeElapsed += delta;
            // è¿”å› true ç»“æŸä¸»å¾ªç¯ã€‚
            return Input.GetMouseButtonMask() != 0 || Input.IsKeyPressed(Key.Escape);
        }
    
        private void _Finalize()
        {
            GD.Print("Finalized:");
            GD.Print($"  End Time: {_timeElapsed}");
        }
    }
